author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jernigan Capital Adds Jonathan Perry As Executive Vice President And Chief Investment Officer
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Jernigan Capital Inc:
* JERNIGAN CAPITAL ANNOUNCES ADDITION OF JONATHAN PERRY AS EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT AND CHIEF INVESTMENT OFFICER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
